title: Rite Version
description: Represents a particular promulgation of the rite.

id.description: A short unique identifier to be referenced.

slug.description: A URL-friendly, unique string identifier for the rite.

name.description: The name of the rite version. eg. Tridentine 1570

promulgated.description: The date when the rite version was promulgated.

notes.description: Optional notes or comments about this rite version.

riteId.description: Reference ID linking to its rite.
